description:
leveldb: fix memfs test for Windows path separator.

I don't actually have a Windows box to test this, but I'm guessing
that this fixes things.

Fixes issue 9.

messages.text:

leveldb: fix memfs test for Windows path separator.

I don't actually have a Windows box to test this, but I'm guessing
that this fixes things.

Fixes issue 9.
